resources.string: You are all up to date
Please make room for an update
A system update is available for your phone, but there is not enough room to download this update right now. You need at least %.1f GB of available space
Please delete some files or apps to free up %.2f GB of space.
System update available memory check notification

A system update is available for your phone, but there is not enough room to download this update right now.A system update is available for your phone, but there is not enough room to download this update right now.A system update is available for your phone, but there is not enough room to download this update right now.A system update is available for your phone, but there is not enough room to download this update right now.A system update is available for your phone, but there is not enough room to download this update right now.A system update is available for your phone, but there is not enough room to download this update right now.A system update is available for your phone, but there is not enough room to download this update right now.A system update is available for your phone, but there is not enough room to download this update right now.A system update is available for your phone, but there is not enough room to download this update right now.A system update is available for your phone, but there is not enough room to download this update right now.A system update is available for your phone, but there is not enough room to download this update right now.A system update is available for your phone, but there is not enough room to download this update right now.
Ok, we will not download this update. To update in the future go to Settings > System Updates.
Ok, we will not install this update. To update in future go to Settings > System Updates.
Ok, we will not download this update. To update in future go to Settings > System Updates.
You will not be able to make or receive calls, including emergency calls for about %d minutes, during the update. This update will restart your phone.
You may continue to use your %1$s while this update is installed in the background. You will be asked to restart your %1$s once it has finished.

The system will download automatically at the selected time. Be sure that your phone is turned on and connected to a charger. If your phone is turned off, the download will happen when the phone is turned on again.

The system will update automatically at the selected time. Be sure that your phone is turned on and connected to a charger. If your phone is turned off, the installation will happen when the phone is turned on again.
Sorry, there was a problem updating your %1$s %2$s. No changes were made.

Sorry, your %1$s %2$s couldnt install this update. Please try again later or use the Software Upgrade Assistant tool on a computer to install the update. All you need is a USB cable. \n \n Just connect your %3$s %4$s to your computer and select System Update from the USB options on your %5$s %6$s. The tool will open on your computer.
Restart your phone to complete the installation.
Your phone will take about %d minutes to restart. Ensure that it is sufficiently charged or that it is plugged into charger.
Low battery. Charge phone to continue
Tap here to restart your phone
We were not able to download this update. To retry, go to Settings > System Updates.
You are not currently connected to a Wi-Fi network.
Download will begin automatically when your phone connects to Wi-Fi.
Tap here to restart your phone.
When would you like to download this system update?
When would you like to install this system update?
Tap here to check memory and proceed
Checking for new software and configuration updates for your %1$s %2$s. Please wait...
Your %1$s %2$s is up to date. No update is necessary at this time
Sorry, we had trouble checking for system updates. This may be because your connection was interrupted. You can try again when you are connected.
